about.intro: I'm a motivated Junior IoT and full-stack developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering. I enjoy building innovative digital solutions that connect the physical and digital worlds — from smart devices to responsive web interfaces.I have hands-on exposure to technologies like React, MongoDB, Django REST Framework, and Next.js, which I’ve used to build modern web applications and dashboards. Through projects like EcoSort, a smart waste management system powered by AI, IoT, and cloud platforms, I’ve applied my skills in both front-end and back-end development, as well as edge computing.
about.secondary: Currently, I’m deepening my knowledge in DevOps and Artificial Intelligence, aiming to stay current with emerging technologies. I’m looking for opportunities where I can learn, grow, and contribute to meaningful and technically challenging projects.
